DEMO_009_MSG_010: ́Ahhhhh! We've been spotted! ... Run for it!
DEMO_009_MSG_020: ́Oh, goodness gracious... my horrid vision strikes yet again.
DEMO_009_MSG_100: ́Perhaps you... Could you be one of these Monster Masters!?
DEMO_009_MSG_030: ́Oh my... I am ever so sorry. I haven't caused you any harm, have I, human?
DEMO_009_MSG_110:
́The %ls here has taken a liking to you.ā
Would you like to let it become your ally?
DEMO_009_MSG_040:
́Pardon my strange appearance, but I am a member of the Nochoro monster family! We aren't your usual savage monster types!
ā
DEMO_009_MSG_050: ́And this is %ls, He looked lost so I saved him.
DEMO_009_MSG_130:
́You really should reconsider this decision. I'm sure it 
wouldn't hurt to have such an ally, right?Ă
DEMO_009_MSG_060: ́No, wait! What in the world are you doing!?
DEMO_009_MSG_140:
̀The %ls became your ally!
Now, give it a name!
DEMO_009_MSG_070:
́Whaaat? Why does %ls like you so much? I was the one that saved him.
ā
DEMO_009_MSG_080:
́Now that I recall, yes... Our King recently informed me of a rather interesting type of human.
ā
DEMO_009_MSG_090:
́I was told that there are certain humans that exist that have the ability to befriend our kind, known simply as "Monster Masters".
ā
